name: Buzzy Business (post-jam version)
description:
/!\ THIS IS A POST-JAM VERSION /!\

The original game was made during LD52 and can be found here. Please play the jam game and rate it before playing the post-jam version.

1.1 additions:

– Mosquito repellent: sprays a slowing debuff

– Bird: a new enemy to dodge

– 3 Difficulty levels: easy (3 lives + blood is harvested faster), medium (3 lives) & hard (1 life)

– Stats on game over

– Some adjustments & bug correction

Controls:

  • Move: Mouse
  • Bite: Space bar

Everything made by me except fonts (Retro Land Mayhem by Dayton Miller & Final by Eric Z) and raw sound effects (by allistersandwich, ScratchnSniff, katzblt, OwlStorm, aglinder, swordofkings128, DrMayta, iwanPlays, AndyTremble, lucabia, SamsterBirdies, Soundkrampf, stradet & nerdwithnikon).
